definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Another recently divorced friend drove this point home.
sentences.chinese: 我另一位离异的朋友能作为佐证。

sentences.english: Flossing your teeth is one of the best examples of the principles of time management.
sentences.chinese: 用牙线清洁牙齿是时间管理原则的最好佐证之一。

sentences.english: This will be based on the study of.
sentences.chinese: 本文将结合本人研究的课题《坛经》给以佐证。

sentences.english: Bakker cited two main arguments to support his theory.
sentences.chinese: 贝克引用了两个主要论点来佐证自己的理论。

sentences.english: Data from well testing and gas production have proved the prediction.
sentences.chinese: 这个分析得到了试气和采气资料的佐证。

sentences.english: The conclusion shows that the calculation of boundary element method is good in precision.
sentences.chinese: 这为边界元解有较高精度这一结论提供了佐证。

sentences.english: Do not give the mortgage lead to higher prices of existing homes is a corroboration of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 期房不给按揭导致更高的价格现房是一个佐证的现象。

sentences.english: He is frequently misquoted in the press.
sentences.chinese: 他引用《圣经》为他的祝辞作佐证。

sentences.english: Four proven cases were presented for examples.
sentences.chinese: 在此例举临证医案四则以佐证。

sentences.english: This book is a carefully documented biography.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本文献佐证翔实可靠的传记。

sentences.english: This perhaps is one of the best proofs supporting Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 这也许是证明马克思主义光芒永耀的极好佐证之一。

sentences.english: What corroborative evidence of the historicity of Chapter 14 can you name?
sentences.chinese: 什么佐证的证据历史性的第14章，可你的名字吗？

sentences.english: We also find more evidence of loneliness and more individuals reporting inadequate social support.
sentences.chinese: 发现同时还为孤独感和不健全的社会能力提供的佐证。

sentences.english: Bloggers have long used the technique to back up their views.
sentences.chinese: 博主们长期使用这项技术来佐证自己的观点。

sentences.english: Be declarative, not mousy, in affirming the truth of the paper and the weight of its evidence.
sentences.chinese: 不要畏畏缩缩，大方肯定自己的研究发现与重要佐证。

sentences.english: " Viking" provided tantalizing support on both sides of the question.
sentences.chinese: 海盗号再次给两方面都提供了似是而非的佐证。

definition: proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
unacceptable as uncorroborated evidence (in law or in textual criticism)
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
